top_comments.comment: Visit https://simplisafe.com/modustrial to learn more and to get at least 30% off your SimpliSafe security system!

Before you even mentioned the attachment for the slow close rails I was thinking "man, push-to-open drawers would be slick". 

That gets my vote.

comments_since_last_sample.body:
Some table inspiration for you: https://youtu.be/7sLQ-2rCdmw?t=109 I'm not saying you have to anchor the table and island like that. But that high industrial modern table that can be pushed against the island to form a bar. That's pretty slick.

Anyway, everything is looking great. Keep up the good work.
I vote for matte black drawer pulls. 😎
